title: Cultural Uncertainty Avoidance Impact Management Strategy When Introducing Blended Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Strategies for managing cultural uncertainty when introducing blended learning to elementary teachers aged 40+. Emphasizing balanced use of offline activities and digital tools in smartphone-dominated environments

learning_goals: Learners can develop a plan for utilizing technological tools in a blended learning environment.
Learners can explain methods for providing clear structure and feedback when designing blended learning lessons.
Learners can develop group activity strategies considering cultural uncertainty avoidance tendencies.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
